meanings.sent1: After serving their time, the army demobs soldiers back to civilian life.
meanings.sent2: The government demobs soldiers when their duty is complete.
meanings.sent3: It's always a relief when the military demobs you and you can go home.
meanings.sent4: The end of the war demobs the troops, setting them free from their duties.
meanings.sent5: The general demobs the soldiers with a sense of gratitude for their service.

meanings.definition: a group of soldiers being released from military service
meanings.sent1: The demobs gathered at the base before heading home.
meanings.sent2: The demobs celebrated their return to civilian life.
meanings.sent3: The demobs shared stories of their time in service, reminiscing about the past.
meanings.sent4: The demobs formed a close bond during their time in the military.
meanings.sent5: The demobs waved goodbye to their comrades as they parted ways.
